original_definition: 'tube heater segment' means a part of a tube heater system that comprises all the elements needed for standalone operation and as such can be tested independently of the other tube heating system parts;
generated_definition: 'tube heater segment' means a segment of a tube heater, typically a length of tubing with a heating element attached, used for heating a specific area or product.

Article 2: ‘tube heater segment’ means a part of a tube heater system that comprises all the elements needed for standalone operation and as such can be tested independently of the other tube heating system parts;

‘tube heater segment’ means a part of atube heater system that comprises all the elements needed for standalone operation and as such can be tested independently of the other tube heating system parts;
